name: the hard worker
description: Seeing the current situation requires that every individual must be able to adapt to health conditions, livelihoods, the economy or other things, both from the upper class of society to the lower class of society who are affected because of the current pandemic. However, if you look more objectively, especially at the lower classes of society, especially individuals who have irregular jobs or identical workers who live depending on the streets, they are so affected that they back up their main job. Street performers dressed as clowns carry their radios hoping to make rupiah coffers by picking up trash for sorting. and sold for the sake of the wheels of the economy that must spin in order to stay alive during the pandemic. They remain unyielding and do not complain for the sake of their lives, even if viewed from another point of view, this may be underestimated because it may be seen from the casing or the packaging.
